POST.POST_BODY: I am 30 weeks 1 day and today my baby was measuring at 32 weeks as per doc. Could it be the result is having GD? Other than baby is healthy!!!

RESPONSE.RESPONSE_BODY: My baby was always measuring a couple of weeks ahead but I didn't have GD, I just come from a long line of big babies. Do you have GD?

Yes, it could well be gd. My son measured big at every scan and ended up coming 3.5 weeks early so was only 3075 at birh :)Are you getting treatment? Is your treatment working? I opted for insulin this time around and i feel much better. Are you keeping to your diet? Such a pain!

My son measured 6 days ahead and was in the 90th percentile about a month ago. Now he's all caught up and measuring on time at 35 weeks. I don't have GD. Sometimes measurements are off. If you haven't been diagnosed with GD, you may not have it. Discuss your concerns with your OB. That's what you're paying them for ;-)

Yes I was diagnosed with GD today and was given metformin and a glucose monitor to check my sugar blood daily. :( yes I am gonna try to keep a steady diet from now til I give birth. I don't want to have prolong diabetes in the long run.
